p: and trouble to them and so affidant says that the said Alexander Hughes in manner and from aforesaid in said affidant did commit the crime of perjury and did willfully corruptly and falsely make said affidant against the peace and contrary to the form of the satute in such cause made and provided and affidant prays that said Alexander Hughes may be with according to law Subscribed and sworn to before me this 4th day of Spetember A. D. 1875 H. Notary Public
